155.title: Another athlete

choices: stuff socks in ur mouth while they shower
1551.content:
How about both? Your name is Jack and you are a 19 yr old skinny short nerdy boy who loves tennis. You wish to be a tennis star but never could get your foot in the door. After a while your dream of ever playing professionally was fading. That is until one day you got a letter in the mail that said you won a trip to Florida to spend the week with Serina and Venus Williams. You forgot about even entering that contest and this could be your chance to show off your skills.

You get to the airport Monday morning and have a return trip for the next Sunday. You're so excited you barely ate anything and saw a limo there to pick you up. Once you got in the limo your nerves kicked in and you felt really nervous about meeting two of the most dominating women tennis players to ever play the game. The limo stopped in front of a huge stadium full of tennis courts and specialized gym equipment just for tennis. The limo driver walked you to the door and when he opened it you saw the two stunning sisters standing there to greet you.

It may have been the nerves or the outfit you wore but whatever it was something was making the girls laugh. They tried to be nice but their giggling made you feel very uncomfortable. They probably weren't expecting such a geek or hoping for some cool macho guy. When they shook your hand you swore they were trying to break it. These girls were powerful that's for sure. They were both in baggy sweat pants and hoody sweatshirts. Serina wore grey and Venus wore black. They listened to you talk about your life barely paying any attention when Serina cut you off and said "We get it. You love tennis. Do you want to play or talk all day?" Venus says quickly "Don't mind her she has a big match coming up and needs to get some work in." A little stunned but you understand and they take you to a private court.

You know your more skilled than you may look and hope to shock them once you start playing. Both sisters pull off their sweat pants revealing matching shorts and then remove their sweatshirts leaving their tight tank top shirts. They begin to walk on the court and you follow. "Excuse me, what the hell are you doing?" Asks Selina. You quietly say "Don't you want me to join you in your practice? I'm very good." They both laugh and Venus said "We need to really practice. You can fetch the balls as we play." They both explode in laughter. This wasn't how you planned your week and snap back "ok. Since it would be pretty embarrassing if I beat you."

Selina from the other side of the court lobbed a tennis ball in the air and swung her racket launching the ball at the speed of sound into the side of your head. You almost fell down as the ball bounced probably 5 stories high off your head. You grab your head and pain and hear Serina "Don't forget where we came from little man. We would crush you and you know it." You reply in anger "Whatever." They both yell at you and Venus tells you "Since you're so good then you're going to play each of us for 5 serves and if you return one of them we will do whatever you want for the week but if you manage to miss every single serve you have to promise to be quiet and do whatever your told. Got it?"

You think for a minute figuring you returned fast serves before and would be able to return at least one and probably could return all ten. "Fine. Let's do this." You answer and soon found yourself opposite court of the great Serina Williams. She threw the ball up and like a green blur the ball whizzed by you scoring the ace. They laughed and Venus saw you start walking to get the ball and screamed "Oh no! You gotta get on your hands and knees and crawl to the ball. Then pick it up with your mouth and return it to my sister and crawl back to your side." That just sounded ridiculous and you tried to laugh it off and keep walking.

Venus was mad you didn't obey such a command and got to the tennis ball at the same time you did. When you bent down to pick it up she stepped on it with her tennis shoe and said "What are you deaf? I said get on your hands and knees and fetch the ball like a dog or this isn't gonna be pretty." She was intimidating as was her sister but there was no way you would do something so humiliating. As you thought Venus punched you square in the face and said "On your knees!" You could play tennis but not fight and these girls didn't seem worried about fighting a boy. As the pain increased in your face Venus cocked her fist back again. You saw this and dropped to your knees bowing before the elite athlete.

Venus rolled the ball under her foot a bit to get it as dirty as possible and stepped back. "Now pick it up properly and bring it to my sister." Tears welling up in your eyes knowing no one was going to help you. You slowly put your face down and open your mouth as wide as possible and grab the dirty ball. They laugh and joke to each other as you crawl tearing up your knees crying til you got to Serina who held out her hand for you to drop the ball in. You had to crawl back and finally could stand up feeling your legs in pain from crawling. Once again the green blur of the ball goes past you and you weren't even close to hitting it. Crying you drop to your knees and make the painful crawl to the ball and then to Serina.

As much as you wanted to show your skills they weren't close to the level of these girls and after missing all of Serina's serves you didn't do any better with Venus as you missed everything. Venus took the ball out of your mouth and asked "Have you learned your lesson?" You nod and she continues with you on your knees before her "And from now on your going to be quiet and do what your told right?" You nod but can't believe what's happening. She tried to shove the ball back in your mouth but you resisted holding your mouth shut. Instantly the sole of her tennis shoe is slammed into your chest sending you onto your back. As you lift your head Venus stood over you and stepped on your throat as Serina came over and stepped across your forehead. Looking up the strong ebony legs of these women you grab at an ankle. Pressure is applied to your neck as you're told "Get your hands down." You obey out of fear and Venus bends down and makes you open your mouth and shoves the ball in.

"Keep that ball in your stupid mouth and watch real tennis players play." Serina said as the girls stepped off your face and had an intense practice and you saw how far your skills were from theirs. You don't know why but you stayed on your hands and knees maybe hoping they would be pleased with your pathetic act of submission. The girls finally returned to the two chairs along the sideline where you were kneeling for about 2 hours. Serina sat down first and began unlacing her shoes. She was going to put on her sporty flip flops but you had an unnatural disgust for bare feet. You wanted to take the ball out of your mouth and ask her not to take her shoes off being that you were less than 2 feet from them.

Soon Serina's feet were bare and the stench was awful. You look at her feet in disgust as she reaches back for her flip flops and then you look up at Venus who sees the face you made. She jumps on it saying "What the hell was that face? You don't like my sisters feet? Does being on your knees sucking on a tennis ball like a damn slave make you think we care how you feel? You should be worshipping her feet." Venus got up and stepped over your head so she was facing her sister also and your head was between her thighs. She grabbed you by the hair and pulled your head up as she squeezed your head between her thighs.

You looked so funny with your head stuck between her thighs with a tennis ball in your mouth facing Serina as she smiled. Sitting in the chair like a queens throne she lifted her barefoot up to your face as you stared at this tennis goddess's foot bottom wishing she would die but instead she laughed as she pressed her foul smelling foot in your face. These girls were much stronger than you and as your body squirmed your head stayed in place and you were forced to breathe every breath against the champions foot. "Smell my foot nerd!" Serina said as Venus added "Yeah, you're never gonna forget this trip. I think he wants to taste your foot I mean he's sniffing pretty hard."

They laugh knowing you had no choice but to sniff hard to breathe. After about 5 minutes Venus pulled your head back and took the ball out of your mouth. You begged "please stop. Ple..." WHACK! Venus smacked you hard in the face and yelled "Shut up and start licking. I want you to know what a champion's foot tastes like!" You wished you were stronger and having such a repulsion for feet made this worse as you stared at the soft sweaty bare sole of Selina's foot. Hands gripping your hair and throat push your face into the awful flesh. "Lick it loser!" Said Serina as she kicked you in the face hard and held it there. You cried tears of utter humiliation as you slid your tongue from her heel to the tip of her toes."Clean that foot wimpy" Venus said as your world was taken over by Selina's foot. The feel the smell the taste and the sight of her foot would be in your nightmares for years. After licking the entire bottom of her gross foot mercy would be far from near.

They forced you to do the same to her other foot and broken your will to even try to resist. After cleaning Selina's feet spotless with your tongue Venus sat down. They both looked at you and saw exactly what you were. A weak loser who hated feet but couldn't do anything about it. They decided to...
1551.title: Serina or Venus Williams (tennis)

1552.content:
You have been working out for years and took up boxing for the last 2 years. One day as you were sparring the great Laila Ali came in the gym. Daughter of the greatest heavyweight boxer of all time she looked stunning. She was actually going to train even though she been out of the fighting game for a while. You started showing off and began really beating on your sparring partner. Dazing him a few times you notice Laila giving you a dirty look. You know it isn't good sportsmanship to try and hurt a guy while training but this was Laila Ali and you had to impress her.

You just made her not like you even more every time you hurt your "opponent". After the rounds were finished you saw Laila hitting the bags in her loose shorts and high boxing shoes. Her sleeveless shirt showed off her toned arm muscles as she pounded the bag. You try to make a move on her which really disgusted her being she was there to train and not be hit on by guys. When the bell sounded in the gym which meant a minute for rest she snapped at you. "You think your lame pick up lines and poor sportsmanship impress me. I'm a girl and could see myself destroying you in the ring."

This was a challenge and your ego would have to take it so you laugh and say "Listen, you haven't been in the ring in a while and I would definitely hurt you so just relax with that crazy talk." She put her nose to yours and said "Get in the ring tough guy and I will show you who's getting hurt." She looked intimidating but you were almost excited to get in the ring wth a girl as hot and famous as her. The gym was empty except for her trainer and the cleaning guy and he was on his way out the door.

She said she had a key to the place and trained at night when no one was there but came early today and was glad because now she could actually fight another person instead of the bags. You stood in the corner staring at her as her trainer taped your gloves tightly around the wrists and then hers. No head gear was worn by either of you and as soon as the bell rang she came out very serious. You playfully bounced around slapping her fists and after a minute she seemed to be getting frustrated she couldn't hit you. As you backed into a corner you slid to the side and all you remember is darkness. Very groggy you feel the canvas floor on your back. As you get to your hands and knees you see Laila has already taken off her gloves and was unwrapping her hand wraps which were usually 6 foot long straps boxers wrapped around their fist to protect there hands.

She had both hands unwrapped and still barely awake you crawl towards her. She laughs as she uses the sweaty hand wraps and wraps it around your neck about 3 times. As you start to choke you grab for the wraps around your neck but boxing gloves are a big padded fist and you can't grab anything with them secured to your hands. She kicks you in the chest and drags you around the ring by your neck taunting you "Did the tough guy get beat up by a girl?" "How come you aren't talking anymore big man?" As she dragged you to the ring ropes and began tying the back of your neck to the top ring rope in the corner.

Still groggy and not getting much oxygen you felt her start punching you in the stomach til you wanted to throw up. She said "look at you. On your knees in the corner with your neck tied like that. It looks very uncomfortable." She enjoyed watching you panic trying to grab at your neck and casually bent down and started unlacing her boxing shoes. You were becoming fully aware now and started screaming vulgar insults at her. She pulled the shoe off her foot and then a thin ankle sock revealing a beautiful bare foot. It seemed large for a girl and you hated everything about feet so even the prettiest feet were gross to you.

She smiled and said "here's your chance big boy. Give me a kiss!" And she lifted her leg up and pressed the hot slimy foot into your face. She leaned forward as your head bent back absorbing the awful foot sweat. She laughed "go ahead. Make out with my foot loser! You got 3 seconds if Idont feel that tongue of yours worshiping my foot I'm gonna leave you here til the morning now do it!" You had no choice as the one thing in the world you hated the most was being rubbed into you face you had to lick and taste it. The worst moment of your life in that ring on your knees at the mercy of Laila Ali. You beg her for mercy but she laughs saying guys like you don't deserve it beating on people in the gym and hitting on girls that don't want to be hit on. She takes off her other shoe and sock and puts a fresh stinky foot in your face.

She loved making you suffer and really grinded her foot into your face while you cried in shame. After licking the champions barefeet clean she started getting ready to leave. She packed her bag and you begged her not to leave you like this tied to the ring ropes by your neck in the ring. She dropped her bag and walked into the ring and had something in her hand. As she got closer you saw it was her socks and before you could utter word she stuffed them deep into your mouth almost choking you. She went into her pocket and pulled out her other sweaty hand wrap and began wrapping it around my mouth and head. It must have went around my head 10 time as she securely knotted it there."that should keep you quiet til I come back in the morning. Try not to think about me okay." She smiled and left the gym shutting off the lights leaving you to suck on her socks on your knees like the beaten man you were.
1552.title: Leihla Ali (boxing)
